hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_ID, VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_NAME ,VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_NAME_CN, VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_NAME_EN, VSSG.VSSG_IS_START_STATUS, VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_DESC, VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_TYPE, VSSG.REC_VER,VSSG.CREATE_TIME, VSSG.CREATOR,VSSG.MODIFY_TIME, VSSG.MODIFIER,VSSG.REC_STATUS, VSSG.TIME_ZONE,VSSG.ORG_ID, VSSG.PM_CODE, VSSG.VSSG_OBJECT_LABEL FROM VS_STATUS_GROUP VSSG WHERE 1=1 << AND VSSG.VSSG_STATUS_GROUP_TYPE IN (:vssgStatusGroupTypes) >> << AND VSSG.ORG_ID IN (:orgIds)>>
